meanings.definition: Relating to or situated near the collarbone.
meanings.sent1: The clavicular injury required a special brace.
meanings.sent2: Her clavicular bone was delicate and slender.
meanings.sent3: The clavicular necklace she wore was a fashion statement.
meanings.sent4: His clavicular touch on the guitar strings was gentle.
meanings.sent5: The clavicular pain shot through her shoulder like lightning.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the clavicle.
meanings.sent2: He felt a sharp pain in his clavicular region.
meanings.sent3: The clavicular shape of the bone made it unique.
meanings.sent5: The clavicular structure provided support for the shoulder.
